00013 SteeringBehaviour::SteeringBehaviour(Vehicle* _agent):
00014   m_vehicle(_agent),
00015   m_activeFlags(0),
00016   m_wanderDistance(3.0),
00017   m_wanderRadius(1.0),
00018   m_wanderJitter(10.0),
00019   m_weightSeek(1.0),
00020   m_weightFlee(1.0),
00021   m_weightArrive(1.0),
00022   m_weightWander(1.0),
00023   m_weightCohesion(1.0),
00024   m_weightSeparation(1.0),
00025   m_weightAlignment(1.0),
00026   m_weightObstacleAvoidance(1.0),
00027   m_weightWallAvoidance(1.0),
00028   m_weightPursuit(1.0),
00029   m_weightEvade(1.0)
00030 {
00031   m_entityMgr = new EntityManager();
00032 
00033   double theta = (float)rand()/RAND_MAX * (M_PI * 2);
00034   m_wanderTarget = ngl::Vec3(m_wanderRadius * cos(theta), 0, m_wanderRadius * sin(theta));
00035 
00036   m_targetAgent = NULL;
00037 }

00048 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 ngl::Vec3 SteeringBehaviour::calculatePrioritizedSum()
00050 {
00051   m_steeringForce = ngl::Vec3(0.f, 0.f, 0.f);
00052 
00053   ngl::Vec3 force;
00054 
00055   if(on(wall_avoidance))
00056   {
00057     force = WallAvoidance() * m_weightWallAvoidance;
00058 
00059     if(!accumulateForce(m_steeringForce, force))
00060     {
00061       return m_steeringForce;
00062     }
00063     else
00064     {
00065       m_steeringForce += force;
00066     }
00067   }
00068 
00069   if(on(obstacle_avoidance))
00070   {
00071     force = ObstacleAvoidance() * m_weightObstacleAvoidance;
00072     if(!accumulateForce(m_steeringForce, force))
00073     {
00074       return m_steeringForce;
00075     }
00076     else
00077     {
00078       m_steeringForce += force;
00079     }
00080   }
00081 
00082   if(on(separation))
00083   {
00084     force = Separation(m_allNeighbours) * m_weightSeparation;
00085     if(!accumulateForce(m_steeringForce, force))
00086     {
00087       return m_steeringForce;
00088     }
00089     else
00090     {
00091       m_steeringForce += force;
00092     }
00093   }
00094 
00095   if(on(cohesion))
00096   {
00097     force = Cohesion(m_friendlyNeighbours) * m_weightCohesion;
00098     if(!accumulateForce(m_steeringForce, force))
00099     {
00100       return m_steeringForce;
00101     }
00102     else
00103     {
00104       m_steeringForce += force;
00105     }
00106   }
00107 
00108   if(on(alignment))
00109   {
00110     force = Alignment(m_friendlyNeighbours) * m_weightAlignment;
00111     if(!accumulateForce(m_steeringForce, force))
00112     {
00113       return m_steeringForce;
00114     }
00115     else
00116     {
00117       m_steeringForce += force;
00118     }
00119   }
00120 
00121   if(on(pursuit))
00122   {
00123     if (m_targetAgent != NULL)
00124     {
00125       force = Pursuit(m_targetAgent) * m_weightPursuit;
00126       if(!accumulateForce(m_steeringForce, force))
00127       {
00128         return m_steeringForce;
00129       }
00130       else
00131       {
00132         m_steeringForce += force;
00133       }
00134     }
00135   }
00136 
00137   if(on(evade))
00138   {
00139     if (m_targetAgent != NULL)
00140     {
00141       force = Evade(m_targetAgent) * m_weightEvade;
00142       if(!accumulateForce(m_steeringForce, force))
00143       {
00144         return m_steeringForce;
00145       }
00146       else
00147       {
00148         m_steeringForce += force;
00149       }
00150     }
00151   }
00152 
00153   if(on(seek))
00154   {
00155     force = Seek(m_vehicle->getCrosshair()) * m_weightSeek;
00156     if(!accumulateForce(m_steeringForce, force))
00157     {
00158       return m_steeringForce;
00159     }
00160     else
00161     {
00162       m_steeringForce += force;
00163     }
00164   }
00165 
00166   if(on(flee))
00167   {
00168     force = Flee(m_vehicle->getCrosshair()) * m_weightFlee;
00169     if(!accumulateForce(m_steeringForce, force))
00170     {
00171       return m_steeringForce;
00172     }
00173     else
00174     {
00175       m_steeringForce += force;
00176     }
00177   }
00178 
00179   if(on(arrive))
00180   {
00181     force = Arrive(m_vehicle->getCrosshair(), 0.1) * m_weightArrive;
00182     if(!accumulateForce(m_steeringForce, force))
00183     {
00184       return m_steeringForce;
00185     }
00186     else
00187     {
00188       m_steeringForce += force;
00189     }
00190   }
00191 
00192   if(on(squad_cohesion))
00193   {
00194     force = SquadCohesion(m_vehicle->getSquadCrosshair(), 0.5) * m_weightSquadCohesion;
00195 
00196     if(!accumulateForce(m_steeringForce, force))
00197     {
00198       return m_steeringForce;
00199     }
00200     else
00201     {
00202       m_steeringForce += force;
00203     }
00204   }
00205 
00206   if(on(wander))
00207   {
00208     force = Wander() * m_weightWander;
00209     if(!accumulateForce(m_steeringForce, force))
00210     {
00211       return m_steeringForce;
00212     }
00213     else
00214     {
00215       m_steeringForce += force;
00216     }
00217   }
00218 
00219   return m_steeringForce;
00220 }

00222 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00224 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00225 bool SteeringBehaviour::accumulateForce(ngl::Vec3 currentTotal, ngl::Vec3 &force)
00226 {
00227   double magnitude = currentTotal.length();
00228 
00229   double forceLeft =  m_vehicle->getMaxForce() - magnitude;
00230 
00231   if(forceLeft < 0.0)
00232   {
00233     return false;
00234   }
00235   else if(force.lengthSquared() > (forceLeft * forceLeft))
00236   {
00237     if(force.lengthSquared() == 0.0f)
00238     {
00239       std::cout<<"Force in accumulate force equals zero, can't normalise"<<std::endl;
00240     }
00241     else
00242     {
00243       force.normalize();
00244     }
00245     force *= m_vehicle->getMaxForce();
00246     return true;
00247   }
00248   else
00249   {
00250     return true;
00251   }
00252 }

00260 ngl::Vec3 SteeringBehaviour::Seek(ngl::Vec3 targetPos)
00261 {
00262   ngl::Vec3 desiredVelocity = ngl::Vec3(targetPos - m_vehicle->getPos());
00263 
00264 
00265   return (desiredVelocity - m_vehicle->getVelocity());
00266 }

00270 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00271 ngl::Vec3 SteeringBehaviour::Flee(ngl::Vec3 targetPos)
00272 {
00273   ngl::Vec3 desiredVelocity = ngl::Vec3(m_vehicle->getPos() - targetPos);
00274 
00275   return desiredVelocity - m_vehicle->getVelocity();
00276 }

00281 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00282 ngl::Vec3 SteeringBehaviour::Arrive(ngl::Vec3 targetPos, int deceleration)
00283 {
00284   ngl::Vec3 toTarget = targetPos - m_vehicle->getPos();
00285   double dist = toTarget.length();
00286 
00287   if(dist>0.1)
00288   {
00289     double decelerationTweak = 0.01;
00290 
00291     double speed = dist/(deceleration*decelerationTweak);
00292 
00293     //make velocity not exceed maxspeed
00294     if( speed > m_vehicle->getMaxSpeed())
00295     {
00296       speed = m_vehicle->getMaxSpeed();
00297     }
00298     ngl::Vec3 desiredVelocity = toTarget * speed/dist;
00299     return(desiredVelocity - m_vehicle->getVelocity());
00300   }
00301   else if(dist <= 0.1 )
00302   {
00303     return ngl::Vec3(0,0,0);
00304   }
00305 
00306   return ngl::Vec3(0,0,0);
00307 }

00309 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00314 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00315 ngl::Vec3 SteeringBehaviour::Wander()
00316 {
00317   double jitterTimeSlice = m_wanderJitter * m_vehicle->getTimeElapsed() ;
00318 
00319   float randomClampedX = -1+2*((float)rand())/RAND_MAX;
00320   float randomClampedZ = -1+2*((float)rand())/RAND_MAX;
00321 
00322   m_wanderTarget += ngl::Vec3(randomClampedX * jitterTimeSlice ,0, randomClampedZ * jitterTimeSlice);
00323 
00324   if(m_wanderTarget.lengthSquared() == 0.0f)
00325   {
00326     std::cout<<"Wander Target in wander equals zero, can't normalise"<<std::endl;
00327   }
00328   else
00329   {
00330     m_wanderTarget.normalize();
00331   }
00332   m_wanderTarget *= m_wanderRadius;
00333   ngl::Vec3 localTarget = m_wanderTarget + ngl::Vec3(m_wanderDistance,0,0);
00334 
00335   // local to world space
00336   ngl::Vec3 headingNormalise;
00337   ngl::Vec3 worldNormalise = ngl::Vec3(1,0,0);
00338   headingNormalise = m_vehicle->getHeading();
00339 
00340   if(headingNormalise.lengthSquared() == 0.0f)
00341   {
00342     std::cout<<"heading Normalise in wander equals zero, can't normalise"<<std::endl;
00343   }
00344   else
00345   {
00346     headingNormalise.normalize();
00347   }
00348 
00349   double dotProduct = worldNormalise.dot(headingNormalise);
00350 
00351   double magnitude = headingNormalise.length()*worldNormalise.length();
00352   double temp = dotProduct/magnitude;
00353   double angle = acos(temp);
00354   if(headingNormalise.m_z > 0)
00355   {
00356     angle = 2*M_PI - angle;
00357   }
00358 
00359   ngl::Transformation trans;
00360   trans.setRotation(0, (-angle * 180)/M_PI, 0);
00361   ngl::Vec3 worldTarget;
00362   worldTarget = trans.getMatrix() * localTarget;
00363 
00364   return worldTarget;
00365 }

00367 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00370 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00371 ngl::Vec3 SteeringBehaviour::Pursuit(const Vehicle *agent)
00372 {
00373   ngl::Vec3 toAgent = agent->getPos() - m_vehicle->getPos();
00374   double relativeHeading = m_vehicle->getHeading().dot(agent->getHeading());
00375 
00376   if ((toAgent.dot(m_vehicle->getHeading().dot(agent->getHeading()))) && (relativeHeading < -0.95))
00377   {
00378     return Seek(agent->getPos());
00379   }
00380 
00381   double lookAheadTime = toAgent.length() / (m_vehicle->getMaxSpeed() + agent->getSpeed());
00382   return Seek(agent->getPos() + agent->getVelocity() * lookAheadTime);
00383 }
00384 
00385 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00388 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00389 ngl::Vec3 SteeringBehaviour::Evade(const Vehicle *agent)
00390 {
00391   ngl::Vec3 toAgent = agent->getPos() - m_vehicle->getPos();
00392 
00393   double lookAheadTime = toAgent.length() / (m_vehicle->getMaxSpeed() + agent->getSpeed());
00394 
00395   ngl::Vec3 agentPos = agent->getPos() + (agent->getVelocity() * lookAheadTime);
00396 
00397   return Flee(agentPos);
00398 }

00400 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00402 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00403 ngl::Vec3 SteeringBehaviour::Separation(std::vector<int> neighbours)
00404 {
00405   ngl::Vec3 separationForce;
00406   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < neighbours.size(); i++)
00407   {
00408     ngl::Vec3 vectorToNeighbour = m_entityMgr->getEntityFromID(neighbours[i])->getPos() - m_vehicle->getPos();
00409 
00410     if(vectorToNeighbour.lengthSquared() == 0.0f)
00411     {
00412       std::cout<<"VectorToNeighbour in separation equals zero, can't normalise"<<std::endl;
00413     }
00414     else
00415     {
00416       vectorToNeighbour.normalize();
00417     }
00418 
00419     vectorToNeighbour /= -(vectorToNeighbour.length());
00420     separationForce += vectorToNeighbour;
00421   }
00422   return separationForce;
00423 }

00425 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00427 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00428 ngl::Vec3 SteeringBehaviour::Alignment(std::vector<int> neighbours)
00429 {
00430   if (neighbours.size() > 0)
00431   {
00432     ngl::Vec3 averageHeading;
00433     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < neighbours.size(); i++)
00434     {
00435       Vehicle* vehicleNeighbour = dynamic_cast<Vehicle*>(m_entityMgr->getEntityFromID(neighbours[i]));
00436       if (vehicleNeighbour)
00437       {
00438         averageHeading += vehicleNeighbour->getHeading();
00439       }
00440     }
00441     averageHeading /= neighbours.size();
00442     averageHeading -= m_vehicle->getHeading();
00443     return averageHeading;
00444   }
00445   else
00446   {
00447     return ngl::Vec3(0.f, 0.f, 0.f);
00448   }
00449 }
00450 
00451 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00453 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00454 ngl::Vec3 SteeringBehaviour::Cohesion(std::vector<int> neighbours)
00455 {
00456   if (neighbours.size() > 0)
00457   {
00458     ngl::Vec3 averagePosition;
00459     ngl::Vec3 cohesionForce;
00460     for (unsigned int i =0; i < neighbours.size(); i++)
00461     {
00462       averagePosition += m_entityMgr->getEntityFromID(neighbours[i])->getPos();
00463     }
00464     averagePosition /= neighbours.size();
00465     cohesionForce = Seek(averagePosition);
00466 
00467     return cohesionForce;
00468   }
00469   else
00470   {
00471     return ngl::Vec3(0.f, 0.f, 0.f);
00472   }
00473 }

00478 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00479 ngl::Vec3 SteeringBehaviour::SquadCohesion(ngl::Vec3 squadPos, int deceleration)
00480 {
00481   //arrive
00482   ngl::Vec3 toTarget = squadPos - m_vehicle->getPos();
00483   double dist = toTarget.length();
00484 
00485   if(dist>0.1)
00486   {
00487     double decelerationTweak = 0.01;
00488 
00489     double speed = dist/(deceleration*decelerationTweak);
00490     //make velocity not exceed maxspeed
00491     if( speed > m_vehicle->getMaxSpeed())
00492     {
00493       speed = m_vehicle->getMaxSpeed();
00494     }
00495 
00496     ngl::Vec3 desiredVelocity = toTarget * speed/dist;
00497     return(desiredVelocity - m_vehicle->getVelocity());
00498   }
00499   else if(dist <= 0.1 )
00500   {
00501     return ngl::Vec3(0,0,0);
00502   }
00503 
00504   return ngl::Vec3(0,0,0);
00505 
00506 }

00508 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00515 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00516 ngl::Vec3 SteeringBehaviour::ObstacleAvoidance()
00517 {
00518   //const std::vector<BaseGameEntity *> &obstacles
00519 
00520   float minDetectionLength = m_vehicle->getBoundingRadius() * 1.5;
00521   float detectionLength = minDetectionLength + ((m_vehicle->getSpeed() / m_vehicle->getMaxSpeed()) * minDetectionLength);
00522 
00523   BaseGameEntity* closestIntersectingObstacle = NULL;
00524   double distanceToCIO = 99999.9;
00525   ngl::Vec3 localPosOfCIO;
00526 
00527 
00528   int numberOfObstacles = m_vehicle->getNeighbourObstacleIDs().size();
00529 
00530   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < numberOfObstacles; ++i)
00531   {
00532     StaticEntity* currentObstacle = dynamic_cast<StaticEntity*>(m_entityMgr->getEntityFromID(m_vehicle->getNeighbourObstacleIDs()[i]));
00533     if (currentObstacle)
00534     {
00535       ngl::Vec3 vectorToObstacle = currentObstacle->getPos() - m_vehicle->getPos();
00536 
00537       if (vectorToObstacle.length() < detectionLength)
00538         {
00539           ngl::Vec3 localPos = worldToLocalSpace(currentObstacle->getPos(), m_vehicle->getPos(), m_vehicle->getHeading(), m_vehicle->getSide());
00540 
00541           // if obstacle is behind vehicle in local space, discard
00542           if (localPos.m_x >= 0.f)
00543           {
00544             double addedRadius = currentObstacle->getBoundingRadius() + m_vehicle->getBoundingRadius();
00545             if (fabs(localPos.m_z) < addedRadius)
00546             {
00547               // intersection of radius and line z = 0
00548               // x = cx +- sqrt(addedRadius^2 - cz^2) where cx and cz are centre coordinates
00549               double sqrtPart = sqrt(addedRadius*addedRadius - localPos.m_z*localPos.m_z);
00550               double intersectX = localPos.m_x - sqrtPart;
00551               if (intersectX <= 0)
00552               {
00553                 intersectX = localPos.m_x + sqrtPart;
00554               }
00555               if (intersectX < distanceToCIO)
00556               {
00557                 distanceToCIO = intersectX;
00558                 closestIntersectingObstacle = currentObstacle;
00559                 localPosOfCIO = localPos;
00560               }
00561             }
00562         }
00563       }
00564     }
00565   }
00566 
00567   if (closestIntersectingObstacle)
00568   {
00569     double mult = 1.0 + (detectionLength - localPosOfCIO.m_x) / detectionLength;
00570     ngl::Vec3 avoidanceForce;
00571 
00572     if (localPosOfCIO.m_z >= 0)
00573     {
00574       avoidanceForce.m_z = (-closestIntersectingObstacle->getBoundingRadius() + localPosOfCIO.m_z) * mult;
00575     }
00576     else if (localPosOfCIO.m_z < 0)
00577     {
00578       avoidanceForce.m_z = (closestIntersectingObstacle->getBoundingRadius() + localPosOfCIO.m_z) * mult;
00579     }
00580 
00581     //breaking force
00582     const double weightBreaking = 1.f;
00583     avoidanceForce.m_x = -(detectionLength - localPosOfCIO.m_x) * weightBreaking;
00584 
00585     // local to world space
00586     ngl::Vec3 headingNormalise;
00587     ngl::Vec3 worldNormalise = ngl::Vec3(1,0,0);
00588     headingNormalise = m_vehicle->getHeading();
00589 
00590     if(headingNormalise.lengthSquared() == 0.0f)
00591     {
00592       std::cout<<"headingNormalise in obstacle avoidance equals zero, can't normalise"<<std::endl;
00593     }
00594     else
00595     {
00596       headingNormalise.normalize();
00597     }
00598     double dotProduct = worldNormalise.dot(headingNormalise);
00599     double magnitude = headingNormalise.length()*worldNormalise.length();
00600     double temp = dotProduct/magnitude;
00601     double angle = acos(temp);
00602     if(headingNormalise.m_z > 0)
00603     {
00604       angle = 2*M_PI - angle;
00605     }
00606     ngl::Transformation trans;
00607     trans.setRotation(0, (-angle * 180)/M_PI, 0);
00608     ngl::Vec3 worldAvoidanceForce;
00609     worldAvoidanceForce = trans.getMatrix() * avoidanceForce;
00610 
00611 
00612     return worldAvoidanceForce;
00613   }
00614   return ngl::Vec3(0.f, 0.f, 0.f);
00615 }
00616 
00617 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00622 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00623 ngl::Vec3 SteeringBehaviour::WallAvoidance()
00624 {
00625   double feelerLength = m_vehicle->getDetectionRadius();
00626   std::vector<ngl::Vec3> feelers;
00627   ngl::Vec3 feelerFront = m_vehicle->getPos() + (feelerLength * m_vehicle->getHeading());
00628   feelers.push_back(feelerFront);
00629   ngl::Transformation trans;
00630   trans.setRotation(0.f, 45.f, 0.f);
00631   ngl::Vec3 feelerLeft = m_vehicle->getPos() + (feelerLength * (m_vehicle->getHeading() * trans.getMatrix()));
00632   feelers.push_back(feelerLeft);
00633   trans.setRotation(0.f, -45.f, 0.f);
00634   ngl::Vec3 feelerRight = m_vehicle->getPos() + (feelerLength * (m_vehicle->getHeading() * trans.getMatrix()));
00635   feelers.push_back(feelerRight);
00636 
00637   ngl::Vec3 currentIntersectPoint;
00638   double distToCurrentIntersect = 0.0;
00639   ngl::Vec3 closestIntersectPoint;
00640   double distToClosestIntersect = 99999.9;
00641   ngl::Vec3 currentClosestWallNormal;
00642   bool feelerTouch = false;
00643 
00644   ngl::Vec3 wallAvoidanceForce = ngl::Vec3(0.f, 0.f, 0.f);
00645   int numberOfFeelers = feelers.size();
00646   for (int i = 0; i < numberOfFeelers; ++i)
00647   {
00648     // need neighbour walls
00649     for (int j= 0; j < m_vehicle->getCurrentCell().getWalls().size(); ++j)
00650     {
00651       ngl::Vec3 wallStart = m_vehicle->getCurrentCell().getWalls()[j].start;
00652       ngl::Vec3 wallEnd = m_vehicle->getCurrentCell().getWalls()[j].end;
00653       ngl::Vec3 wallLine = wallEnd - wallStart;
00654       ngl::Vec3 wallNormal = wallLine.cross(ngl::Vec3(0.f, 1.f, 0.f));
00655 
00656       if(wallNormal.lengthSquared() == 0.0f)
00657       {
00658         std::cout<<"Wall normal in wall avoidance equals zero, can't normalise"<<std::endl;
00659       }
00660       else
00661       {
00662         wallNormal.normalize();
00663       }
00664 
00665       if (lineIntersection2D(m_vehicle->getPos(), feelers[i], wallStart, wallEnd, distToCurrentIntersect, currentIntersectPoint))
00666       {
00667         if (distToCurrentIntersect < distToClosestIntersect)
00668         {
00669           distToClosestIntersect = distToCurrentIntersect;
00670           feelerTouch = true;
00671           closestIntersectPoint = currentIntersectPoint;
00672           currentClosestWallNormal = wallNormal;
00673         }
00674       }
00675 
00676     }
00677     if (feelerTouch == true)
00678     {
00679       ngl::Vec3 overShoot = feelers[i] - closestIntersectPoint;
00680       ngl::Vec3 reverseOverShoot = currentClosestWallNormal * overShoot.length();
00681       wallAvoidanceForce = reverseOverShoot;
00682 
00683     }
00684   }
00685   return wallAvoidanceForce;
00686 }
00687 
00688 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00690 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00691 ngl::Vec3 SteeringBehaviour::worldToLocalSpace(ngl::Vec3 pointWorldPos, ngl::Vec3 vehiclePos, ngl::Vec3 vehicleHeading, ngl::Vec3 vehicleSide)
00692 {
00693   if(vehicleHeading.lengthSquared() == 0.0f)
00694   {
00695     std::cout<<"Vehicle heading in worldToLocalSpace equals zero, can't normalise"<<std::endl;
00696   }
00697   else
00698   {
00699     vehicleHeading.normalize();
00700   }
00701   if(vehicleSide.lengthSquared() == 0.0f)
00702   {
00703     std::cout<<"Vehicle side in worldToLocalSpace equals zero, can't normalise"<<std::endl;
00704   }
00705   else
00706   {
00707     vehicleSide.normalize();
00708   }
00709 
00710   double Tx = vehiclePos.dot(vehicleHeading);
00711   double Tz = vehiclePos.dot(vehicleSide);
00712 
00713   ngl::Mat4 mat;
00714   mat.m_00 = vehicleHeading.m_x; mat.m_02 = vehicleHeading.m_z; mat.m_03 = -Tx;
00715   mat.m_20 = vehicleSide.m_x;    mat.m_22 = vehicleSide.m_z;    mat.m_23 = -Tz;
00716   double tempX = (mat.m_00 * pointWorldPos.m_x) + (mat.m_02 * pointWorldPos.m_z) + mat.m_03;
00717   double tempZ = (mat.m_20 * pointWorldPos.m_x) + (mat.m_22 * pointWorldPos.m_z) + mat.m_23;
00718 
00719   return ngl::Vec3(tempX, 0, tempZ);
00720 }
00721 
00722 
00723 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00724 void SteeringBehaviour::addAllNeighbours(std::vector<int> _neighbours)
00725 {
00726   for (int i = 0; i < _neighbours.size(); i++)
00727   {
00728     m_allNeighbours.push_back(_neighbours[i]);
00729   }
00730 
00731 }

00735 void SteeringBehaviour::addFriendlyNeighbours(std::vector<int> _neighbours)
00736 {
00737   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < _neighbours.size(); i++)
00738   {
00739     m_friendlyNeighbours.push_back(_neighbours[i]);
00740   }
00741 }

00744 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00747 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00748 bool SteeringBehaviour::lineIntersection2D(ngl::Vec3 startLineA, ngl::Vec3 endLineA, ngl::Vec3 startLineB, ngl::Vec3 endLineB,
00749                                            double &o_distToIntersect, ngl::Vec3 &o_intersectPoint)
00750 {
00751   double rTop = (startLineA.m_z-startLineB.m_z)*(endLineB.m_x-startLineB.m_x)-(startLineA.m_x-startLineB.m_x)*(endLineB.m_z-startLineB.m_z);
00752   double rBot = (endLineA.m_x-startLineA.m_x)*(endLineB.m_z-startLineB.m_z)-(endLineA.m_z-startLineA.m_z)*(endLineB.m_x-startLineB.m_x);
00753 
00754   double sTop = (startLineA.m_z-startLineB.m_z)*(endLineA.m_x-startLineA.m_x)-(startLineA.m_x-startLineB.m_x)*(endLineA.m_z-startLineA.m_z);
00755   double sBot = (endLineA.m_x-startLineA.m_x)*(endLineB.m_z-startLineB.m_z)-(endLineA.m_z-startLineA.m_z)*(endLineB.m_x-startLineB.m_x);
00756 
00757   if ((rBot == 0) || (sBot == 0))
00758   {
00759     return false;
00760   }
00761 
00762   double r = rTop/rBot;
00763   double s = sTop/sBot;
00764 
00765   if ((r > 0.0) && (r < 1.0) && (s > 0.0) && (s < 1.0))
00766   {
00767     ngl::Vec3 lineA = endLineA - startLineA;
00768     o_distToIntersect = lineA.length() * r;
00769     o_intersectPoint = startLineA + (r * (endLineA - startLineA));
00770     return true;
00771   }
00772   else
00773   {
00774     //dist = 0.0;
00775     return false;
00776   }
00777 }
00778 
00779 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00783 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00784 void SteeringBehaviour::ObjectOverlapAvoidance()
00785 {
00786 
00787 
00788   int numberOfNeighbours = m_allNeighbours.size();
00789   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < numberOfNeighbours; i++)
00790   {
00791     Vehicle* curEntity = dynamic_cast<Vehicle*>(m_entityMgr->getEntityFromID(m_allNeighbours[i]));
00792     if (curEntity)
00793     {
00794       //make sure we don't check against ourselves
00795       Vehicle* entity = dynamic_cast<Vehicle*>(m_entityMgr->getEntityFromID(m_vehicle->getID()));
00796       if (curEntity == entity) continue;
00797 
00798       ngl::Vec3 vecToEntity = m_vehicle->getPos() - curEntity->getPos();
00799       double distFromEachOther = vecToEntity.length();
00800 
00801       double amountOfOverLap = (m_vehicle->getBoundingRadius() + curEntity->getBoundingRadius()) - distFromEachOther;
00802 
00803       if (amountOfOverLap >= 0)
00804       {
00805         m_vehicle->setPos(m_vehicle->getPos() + (vecToEntity/distFromEachOther) * amountOfOverLap);
00806       }
00807      }
00808   }
00809 
00810   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_vehicle->getNeighbourObstacleIDs().size(); i++)
00811   {
00812     StaticEntity* curEntity = dynamic_cast<StaticEntity*>(m_entityMgr->getEntityFromID(m_vehicle->getNeighbourObstacleIDs()[i]));
00813     if (curEntity)
00814     {
00815       ngl::Vec3 vecToEntity = m_vehicle->getPos() - curEntity->getPos();
00816       double distFromEachOther = vecToEntity.length();
00817 
00818       double amountOfOverLap = (m_vehicle->getBoundingRadius() + curEntity->getBoundingRadius()) - distFromEachOther;
00819 
00820       if (amountOfOverLap >= 0)
00821       {
00822         m_vehicle->setPos(m_vehicle->getPos() + (vecToEntity/distFromEachOther) * amountOfOverLap);
00823       }
00824     }
00825   }
00826 
00827 }
00828 
00829 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00833 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00834 void SteeringBehaviour::WallOverlapAvoidance()
00835 {
00836   for (int j= 0; j < m_vehicle->getCurrentCell().getWallsInCell().size(); ++j)
00837   {
00838     ngl::Vec3 wallStart = m_vehicle->getCurrentCell().getWallsInCell()[j].start;
00839     ngl::Vec3 wallEnd = m_vehicle->getCurrentCell().getWallsInCell()[j].end;
00840     ngl::Vec3 wallLine = wallEnd - wallStart;
00841     ngl::Vec3 wallNormal = wallLine.cross(ngl::Vec3(0.f, 1.f, 0.f));
00842 
00843     if(wallNormal.lengthSquared() == 0.0f)
00844     {
00845       std::cout<<"wall normal in wall overlap avoidance equals zero, can't normalise"<<std::endl;
00846     }
00847     else
00848     {
00849       wallNormal.normalize();
00850     }
00851 
00852     if (wallLine.m_x != 0.f)
00853     {
00854       // upper or lower wall
00855       float zDistToWall = fabs(wallStart.m_z - m_vehicle->getPos().m_z);
00856 
00857       float amountOfOverLap = m_vehicle->getBoundingRadius() - zDistToWall;
00858       if (amountOfOverLap >= 0)
00859       {
00860         m_vehicle->setPos(m_vehicle->getPos() + (wallNormal * amountOfOverLap));
00861       }
00862     }
00863     else if (wallLine.m_z != 0.f)
00864     {
00865       // left or right wall
00866       float xDistToWall = fabs(wallStart.m_x - m_vehicle->getPos().m_x);
00867 
00868       float amountOfOverLap = m_vehicle->getBoundingRadius() - xDistToWall;
00869       if (amountOfOverLap >= 0)
00870       {
00871         m_vehicle->setPos(m_vehicle->getPos() + (wallNormal * amountOfOverLap));
00872       }
00873     }
00874 
00875   }
00876 }
